mapper.select: SELECT board_id AS boardId, board_type AS boardType, title AS title, content AS content, writer AS writer, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM board WHERE board_type = #{boardType} AND is_active = true ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT board_id AS boardId, board_type AS boardType, title AS title, content AS content, writer AS writer, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM board WHERE board_id = #{boardId} AND is_active = true
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (board_type, title, content, writer, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{boardType}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE board_id = #{boardId}
UPDATE board SET is_active = 0, updated_at = NOW() WHERE board_id = #{boardId}
